block.p: Children ages 2 to 12 have an average 58 hours of leisure time each week, according to the NPD Group, which they use for activities like playing with toys (85 percent); homework (67 percent); going to the park (52 percent) and talking on the phone (26 percent).

Children use the computer for the same things that adults do, but most sit down to play games. Sixty percent of all children use the computer for non-homework related activities, the same percentage as those who pick up a book for fun.
